The correct answer is C: A large pink speech bubble alongside images of a newspaper, a meeting at a table, and a person speaking into a microphone.
This visual represents General American English as it includes elements commonly associated with professional communication such as a microphone and a newspaper, which are often used in formal settings. The presence of a meeting at a table also suggests a business-like environment, further supporting the idea of General American English being a dialect used in professional contexts.
Option A: A purple “Phonology” title and a diagram mapping “th” to t and f (for /θ/) and to d and v (for /ð/), with phonetic symbols and arrows.
